content.data: Change the Construction for One Cabinet in My Job
I have a Job where I want to change my Construction Method for just a couple of Cabinets in the Room. How is that done?

Double click on the specific Cabinet and got to the Section Editor. 
 
 
 Go to  Properties | Construction . 
 
 
 Select the Construction Method you want to change to for just this Cabinet.
Double click on the specific Cabinet and got to the Section Editor.
Double click on the specific Cabinet and got to the Section Editor.
Select the Construction Method you want to change to for just this Cabinet.
Select the Construction Method you want to change to for just this Cabinet.
